query.name: 채널 정보 수집
query.extractionQuery: SELECT CHNL_ID , CHNL_NM , SUBSTRING(RGSN_DTTM,1,8) AS RGSN_DT FROM CHNL_LDGR WHERE SUBSTRING(RGSN_DTTM,1,8) = ?
query.transformationLoadingQuery: INSERT INTO DW_CHNL_INFM(CHNL_ID , CHNL_NM , RGSN_DT) VALUES(#CHNL_ID# , #CHNL_NM# , #RGSN_DT#)

query.name: 이용기관 정보 수집
query.extractionQuery: SELECT USE_INTT_ID , STTS , BSNN_NM , ATHZ_DT , (CASE WHEN STTS = '1' THEN '99999999' ELSE SUBSTRING(AMNN_DTTM,1,8) END) AS STTS_MDDA_DT FROM USE_INTT_LDGR WHERE ATHZ_DT = ?
query.transformationLoadingQuery: INSERT INTO DW_USE_INTT_INFM(USE_INTT_ID , STTS , USE_INTT_NM , ATHZ_DT , STTS_MDDA_DT) VALUES(#USE_INTT_ID# , #STTS# , #BSNN_NM# , #ATHZ_DT# , #STTS_MDDA_DT#)

query.name: 이용기관 정보 상태 갱신
query.extractionQuery: SELECT USE_INTT_ID , STTS , SUBSTRING(AMNN_DTTM,1,8) AS AMNN_DT FROM USE_INTT_LDGR WHERE SUBSTRING(AMNN_DTTM,1,8) = ?
query.transformationLoadingQuery: UPDATE DW_USE_INTT_INFM SET STTS = #STTS# , STTS_MDDA_DT = #AMNN_DT# WHERE USE_INTT_ID = #USE_INTT_ID# AND STTS <> #STTS#

query.name: 사용자 정보 수집
query.extractionQuery: SELECT A.USER_ID , A.USER_NM , A.CLPH_NO , A.EML , SUBSTRING(RGSN_DTTM,1,8) AS RGSN_DT FROM USER_LDGR A WHERE SUBSTRING(RGSN_DTTM,1,8) = ?
query.transformationLoadingQuery: INSERT INTO DW_USER_INFM(USER_ID , USER_NM , CLPH_NO , EML , RGSN_DT) VALUES(#USER_ID# , #USER_NM# , #CLPH_NO# , #EML# , #RGSN_DT#)

query.name: APP 정보 수집
query.extractionQuery: SELECT A.APP_SRNO , B.APP_NM , A.CNTS_ID FROM APP_LDGR A INNER JOIN APP_LNGG_PER_INFM B ON (A.APP_SRNO = B.APP_SRNO AND B.LNGG_DSNC = 'DF') WHERE SUBSTRING(RGSN_DTTM,1,8) = ?
query.transformationLoadingQuery: INSERT INTO DW_APP_INFM(APP_SRNO , APP_NM , CNTS_ID ) VALUES(TO_NUMBER(#APP_SRNO#,'99999') , #APP_NM# , #CNTS_ID#)

query.name: 이용기관별 사용자 내역 승인 사용자 등록
query.extractionQuery: SELECT B.CHNL_ID , B.USE_INTT_ID , B.USER_ID , A.ATHZ_DT , '99999999' AS TRMT_DT FROM USE_INTT_USER_LDGR A INNER JOIN USE_INTT_PER_USER B ON (A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID) AND A.ATHZ_DT = ?
query.transformationLoadingQuery: INSERT INTO DW_USE_INTT_PER_USER_HSTR(CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , USER_ID , ATHZ_DT , TRMT_DT) VALUES(#CHNL_ID# , #USE_INTT_ID# , #USER_ID# , #ATHZ_DT# , #TRMT_DT#)

query.name: 이용기관별 사용자 내역 해지 사용자 갱신
query.extractionQuery: SELECT CCTN_CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , USER_ID , PCSN_DT FROM USER_SECS_LDGR WHERE PCSN_DT = ?
query.transformationLoadingQuery: UPDATE DW_USE_INTT_PER_USER_HSTR SET TRMT_DT = #PCSN_DT# WHERE CHNL_ID = #CCTN_CHNL_ID# AND USE_INTT_ID = #USE_INTT_ID# AND USER_ID = #USER_ID#

query.name: APP구매내역 등록
query.extractionQuery: SELECT (CASE WHEN CCTN_CHNL_ID = '' THEN 'CHNL_1' ELSE COALESCE(CCTN_CHNL_ID,'CHNL_1') END) AS CCTN_CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , APP_SRNO , CNRC_RSPR_ID , AGRM_TERM_STDD , '99999999' AS TRMT_DT FROM USE_INTT_PER_AGRM_BSC_INFM WHERE CNRC_DSNC = '2' AND AGRM_TERM_STDD = '20151218'
query.transformationLoadingQuery: INSERT INTO DW_APP_BUY_HSTR(CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , APP_SRNO , BYR_ID , BUY_DT , TRMT_DT) VALUES(#CCTN_CHNL_ID# , #USE_INTT_ID# , TO_NUMBER(#APP_SRNO#,'99999') , #CNRC_RSPR_ID# , #AGRM_TERM_STDD# , #TRMT_DT#)

query.name: APP구매내역 해지일자 갱신
query.extractionQuery: SELECT (CASE WHEN CCTN_CHNL_ID = '' THEN 'CHNL_1' ELSE COALESCE(CCTN_CHNL_ID,'CHNL_1') END) AS CCTN_CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , APP_SRNO , CNRC_RSPR_ID , AGRM_TERM_FNDA FROM USE_INTT_PER_AGRM_BSC_INFM WHERE CNRC_DSNC = '2' AND AGRM_TERM_FNDA = ?
query.transformationLoadingQuery: UPDATE DW_APP_BUY_HSTR SET TRMT_DT = #AGRM_TERM_FNDA# WHERE CHNL_ID = #CCTN_CHNL_ID# AND USE_INTT_ID = #USE_INTT_ID# AND APP_SRNO = TO_NUMBER(#APP_SRNO#,'99999') AND BYR_ID = #CNRC_RSPR_ID#

query.name: 이용기관별 APP 이용 실적 등록
query.extractionQuery: SELECT CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , APP_SRNO , SUBSTRING(APRVL_DTTM,1,8) AS APRVL_DT , COUNT(USE_INTT_ID) AS USE_CNT FROM USER_PER_APP_USE_INFM WHERE SUBSTRING(APRVL_DTTM,1,8) = ? GROUP BY CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , APP_SRNO , SUBSTRING(APRVL_DTTM,1,8)
query.transformationLoadingQuery: INSERT INTO DW_USE_INTT_PER_APP_ACRS(CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , APP_SRNO , ATHZ_DT , USE_CNT) VALUES(#CHNL_ID# , #USE_INTT_ID# , TO_NUMBER(#APP_SRNO#,'99999') , #APRVL_DT# , TO_NUMBER(#USE_CNT#,'99999'))

query.name: 로그인 실적 등록
query.extractionQuery: SELECT CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , USER_ID , LGN_DT , JNNG_PATH , COUNT(USER_ID) AS LGN_CNT FROM( SELECT CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , USER_ID , LGN_DT , (CASE WHEN LGN_DVC_DSNC = 'mobile' THEN 'mobile' ELSE 'pc' END) AS JNNG_PATH FROM LGN_PRHS WHERE LGN_DT = ? )A GROUP BY CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , USER_ID , LGN_DT , JNNG_PATH
query.transformationLoadingQuery: INSERT INTO DW_LGN_ACRS(CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , USER_ID , CCTN_DSNC , LGN_DT , LGN_CNT) VALUES(#CHNL_ID# , #USE_INTT_ID# , #USER_ID# , #JNNG_PATH# , #LGN_DT# , TO_NUMBER(#LGN_CNT#,'99999'))

query.name: 접속 디바이 등록
query.extractionQuery: SELECT CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , JNNG_PATH , USER_OS , USER_BR , USER_BR_VER , LGN_DT , COUNT(LGN_DT) AS USE_CNT FROM( SELECT CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , (CASE WHEN LGN_DVC_DSNC = 'mobile' THEN 'mobile' ELSE 'pc' END) AS JNNG_PATH , (CASE WHEN USER_OS = '' THEN 'none' ELSE COALESCE(USER_OS ,'none') END) AS USER_OS , (CASE WHEN USER_BR = '' THEN 'none' ELSE COALESCE(USER_BR ,'none') END) AS USER_BR , (CASE WHEN USER_BR_VER = '' THEN 'none' ELSE COALESCE(USER_BR_VER,'none') END) AS USER_BR_VER , LGN_DT FROM LGN_PRHS WHERE LGN_DT = ? )A GROUP BY CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , JNNG_PATH , USER_OS , USER_BR , USER_BR_VER , LGN_DT
query.transformationLoadingQuery: INSERT INTO DW_CCTN_DVC_ACRS(CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , CCTN_DSNC , OS , BR , BR_VER , CCTN_DT , USE_CNT) VALUES(#CHNL_ID# , #USE_INTT_ID# , #JNNG_PATH# , #USER_OS# , #USER_BR# , #USER_BR_VER# , #LGN_DT# , TO_NUMBER(#USE_CNT#,'99999'))

query.name: APP 실행 실적 등록
query.extractionQuery: SELECT CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_SRNO , CNTS_ID , CRTC_DT , USER_ID , COUNT(USER_ID) AS EXCN_CNT FROM( SELECT COALESCE(CCTN_CHNL_ID ,'CHNL_1') AS CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_SRNO , CNTS_ID , CRTC_DT , USER_ID FROM WA_CRTC_PRHS WHERE PTL_ID = 'PTL_51' AND CRTC_DT = ? AND USE_INTT_SRNO <> '999999999' )A GROUP BY CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_SRNO , CNTS_ID , USER_ID , CRTC_DT
query.transformationLoadingQuery: INSERT INTO DW_APP_EXCN_ACRS(CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , CNTS_ID , USER_ID , EXCN_DT , EXCN_CNT) VALUES(#CHNL_ID# , #USE_INTT_SRNO# , #CNTS_ID# , #USER_ID# , #CRTC_DT# , TO_NUMBER(#EXCN_CNT#,'99999'))

query.name: We-Cloud 사용 실적 등록
query.extractionQuery: SELECT CCTN_CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , CNTS_ID , USER_ID , AMNN_DT , COUNT(USER_ID ) AS FILE_CNT , SUM (FILE_SIZE) AS USQN FROM( SELECT COALESCE(CCTN_CHNL_ID ,'CHNL_1') AS CCTN_CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , CNTS_ID , USER_ID , AMNN_DT , FILE_SIZE FROM UPLOAD_FILE_USE_HSTR WHERE FILE_STTS = 'F' AND AMNN_DT = ? AND API_ID NOT IN ('R6XMM954uGg3beGsJpl9c1B2iUxwAPXz0nyPy50fHQXHPsRQCz' , 'RUnydaXkje6f6cboNKWlYS9V30lmvbx02U-KsyBlIS0kDld_B2') AND CHNL_ID <> '999999999' )A GROUP BY CCTN_CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , CNTS_ID , USER_ID , AMNN_DT
query.transformationLoadingQuery: INSERT INTO DW_CLD_USE_ACRS(CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , CNTS_ID , USER_ID , UPLOAD_DT , USQN , FILE_CNT) VALUES(#CCTN_CHNL_ID# , #USE_INTT_ID# , #CNTS_ID# , #USER_ID# , #AMNN_DT# , TO_NUMBER(#USQN#,'999999999999999') , TO_NUMBER(#FILE_CNT#,'9999'))

query.name: We-Cloud 업로드 확장자 실적 등록
query.extractionQuery: SELECT CCTN_CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , CNTS_ID , FILE_TYPE , AMNN_DT , COUNT(FILE_TYPE ) AS FILE_CNT FROM( SELECT COALESCE(CCTN_CHNL_ID ,'CHNL_1') AS CCTN_CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , CNTS_ID , COALESCE(FILE_TYPE , 'none') AS FILE_TYPE , AMNN_DT FROM UPLOAD_FILE_USE_HSTR WHERE FILE_STTS = 'F' AND AMNN_DT = ? AND API_ID NOT IN ('R6XMM954uGg3beGsJpl9c1B2iUxwAPXz0nyPy50fHQXHPsRQCz' , 'RUnydaXkje6f6cboNKWlYS9V30lmvbx02U-KsyBlIS0kDld_B2') AND CHNL_ID <> '999999999' )A GROUP BY CCTN_CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , CNTS_ID , FILE_TYPE , AMNN_DT
query.transformationLoadingQuery: INSERT INTO DW_CLD_FILE_EXT_ACRS(CHNL_ID , USE_INTT_ID , CNTS_ID , FILE_EXT , UPLOAD_DT , USE_CNT) VALUES(#CCTN_CHNL_ID# , #USE_INTT_ID# , #CNTS_ID# , #FILE_TYPE# , #AMNN_DT# , TO_NUMBER(#FILE_CNT#,'9999'))
